author: IGN
description:
Watch the Estela Character Trailer for Destiny: Rising, a sci-fi mobile RPG developed by NetEase Games. Players can learn about Estela, the Ahamkara Bane, who lives with her thoughts overcome with dread. Get a look at some lore and gameplay for Estela from Destiny: Rising, available now for iOS and Android.

#DestinyRising #Gaming #IGN
title: Destiny: Rising - Official Estela Character Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Angela arrives in Marvel Rivals Season 4 on September 12, and she’s bringing a whole new playstyle to the battlefield. In this full Angela gameplay breakdown, we dive into every part of her kit, from her dual attack modes to her high-flying mobility and devastating ultimate.

Angela is the first flying tank in Marvel Rivals, combining agility, shield mechanics, and two distinct weapon styles. We’ll cover her basic combos, Assassin’s Charge, Divine Judgment, Shielded Stance, and her ultimate Heaven’s Retribution, as well as her team-up synergy with Thor.

#Angela #MarvelRivals #Gaming
title: Marvel Rivals: Angela Gameplay - Full Move Set Breakdown (Season 4)

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Former Bethesda executive Pete Hines is the altest gaming exec to come out against Xbox Game Pass. Hines was the Senior Vice President of Global Marketing and Communications as Xbox-owned Bethesda, and in a recent interview has questioned the value Game Pass provides to developers. He joins former PlayStation exec Shawn Layden, who has come out against gaming subscription services in general. Another former Microsoft VP, Shannon Loftis, backed up Hines' comments, adding that games launched on Game Pass need to have post-release monetization plans to make up for lost retail revenue. In other news, Keanu Reeves is open to returning to the Cyberpunk franchise for the sequel, Cyberpunk 2. Reeves played Johnny Silverhand in Cyberpunk 2077, and famously made a huge impression at E3 2019 when his role was formerly revealed. And finally, Gearbox's Randy Pitchford says the Borderlands 4 Day 1 Patch 'does a lot,' but you really should be playing the game on at least a mini
title: Xbox Game Pass Creates "Weird Inner Tensions," Says Former Bethesda Exec - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Silksong, like Hollow Knight before it, is a difficult game, and having a bit more health can make the difference in some tough fights. Here is how to find four Mask Shards to increase your health in Hollow Knight: Silksong. These are the first four Mask Shards that you can find in the game.

00:00 - Intro
00:21 - Mask Shard #1: Pebb’s Store - Bone Bottom
00:43 - Mask Shard #2: Hidden Pool Wall - Wormways
01:59 - Mask Shard #3: Exploding Rock Puzzle - Far Fields
03:08 - Mask Shard #4: White Flower Pogo Puzzle - Shellwood
03:58 - Outro

Check out our expanding wiki for more help with collectibles, bosses, exploration and much more.
https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - How To Find the First Four Mask Fragments (Extra Health)

author: IGN
description: Check out the Story Trailer for The Lonesome Guild, an upcoming top-down action RPG developed by Tiny Bull Studios. Players will navigate through a world full of loneliness where friendship is the ultimate antidote. Assemble a crew of six characters with unique skills, stories, and challenges to pull off powerful combos, engage in deep combat, and establish bonds that have the power to change reality. The Lonesome Guild is launching on October 23 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: The Lonesome Guild - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the third chapter of the hit mystery detective series with Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery, distributed by Netflix. Join Benoit Blanc once again on a thrilling murder mystery in theaters on November 26 and streaming on Netflix on December 12.

Benoit Blanc returns for his most dangerous case yet in the third and darkest chapter of Rian Johnson’s murder mystery opus. When young priest Jud Duplenticy is sent to assist charismatic firebrand Monsignor Jefferson Wicks , it’s clear that all is not well in the pews. Wicks’s modest-but-devoted flock includes devout church lady Martha Delacroix circumspect groundskeeper Samson Holt, tightly-wound lawyer Vera Draven, Esq, aspiring politician Cy Draven, town doctor Nat Sharp, best-selling author Lee Ross, and concert cellist Simone Vivane. After a sudden and seemingly impossible murder rocks the town, the lack of an obvious suspect prompts local police chief Geraldine Scott to join forces with renowned detective Benoit Blanc to
title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Daniel Craig, Mila Kunis

author: IGN
description: You’re just an average postman, but today is anything but average. It’s the end of the world and you suddenly have the power to control time itself. By moving forwards or backwards, you alone control the flow of time to solve problems, change outcomes, and discover secrets as you try to save the world. Get a deep dive into the gameplay of Recur in this latest trailer for the upcoming puzzle-platformer game. The new Recur trailer gives a peek at how you can solve problems and the game's time manipulation mechanic in action. Recur will be available on PC. Learn about Recur and wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2595260/RECUR/
title: Recur - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Tune in Tuesday, September 9 at 9am PT / Noon ET / 6pm CEST for an exciting developer livestream from the Destiny 2 team! Viewers will see a preview for the Star Wars-inspired expansion coming on December 2, Destiny 2: Renegades – as well as new content for the first major update for The Edge of Fate, Ash and Iron – which launches immediately after the stream.

#IGN
title: Destiny 2: Renegades and Ash & Iron Reveal Livestream

author: IGN
description: Here's your look at the Super Pocket NEOGEO Edition, a new handheld device celebrating SNK's arcade legacy. The Super Pocket NEOGEO Edition gaming system comes preloaded with 14 classic NEOGEO arcade titles, including Alpha Mission II, Blazing Star, Fatal Fury Special, King of the Monsters 2: The Next Thing, Last Resort, Metal Slug X, Mutation Nation, Over Top, Samurai Shodown II, Shock Troopers: 2nd Squad, Soccer Brawl, Top Hunter: Roddy & Cathy, and The Last Blade. The Super Pocket NEOGEO Edition is fully compatible with Evercade cartridges. Super Pocket NEOGEO Edition is available now.
title: Super Pocket NEOGEO Edition - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
title: Meet the tank of Borderlands 4: Amon the Forgeknight. Presented by @BorderlandsGame

author: IGN
description:
A twisted tale of childhood gone wrong. Watch the Winnie-the-Pooh: Black Honey announcement trailer for the upcoming physics-driven open world survival horror game where every item matters and every encounter is a deadly cartoon trap waiting to happen. Set in a haunting reimagining of the Hundred Acre Wood, you’ll need creativity, quick thinking, and a bit of mischief to outsmart monstrous versions of Winnie-the-Pooh, Piglet, Eeyore, and Owl—each stalking their own territory with distinct behaviors and horrors. Winnie-the-Pooh: Black Honey will be available on PC.

#IGN #gaming
title: Winnie-the-Pooh: Black Honey - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Drop into unknown planets and try to successfully extract with the valuable eggs you seek in this first-person co-op shooter – but don't think for a second that the dinosaurs these eggs belong to won't come looking for you. 

Wishlist Eggspedition on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3970880/Eggspedition/

#Eggspedition #Gaming #IGN
title: Eggspedition: Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Dust Bunny trailer for this upcoming film starring Mads Mikkelsen, Sophie Sloan, Sigourney Weaver, and David Dastmalchian.

Ten-year-old Aurora has a mysterious neighbor (Mads Mikkelsen) who kills real-life monsters. He’s a hit man for hire. So, when Aurora needs help killing the monster she believes ate her entire family, she procures his services. Suspecting that her parents may have fallen victim to assassins gunning for him, Aurora’s neighbor guiltily takes the job. Now, to protect her, he’ll need to battle an onslaught of assassins ― and accept that some monsters are real.

Dust Bunny is produced by Bryan Fuller, Basil Iwanyk, and Erica Lee.

Dust Bunny, written and directed by Bryan Fuller, opens in theaters on December 5, 2025.

#DustBunny #Movies #IGN
title: Dust Bunny - Official Trailer (2025) Mads Mikkelsen, Sigourney Weaver, David Dastmalchian

author: IGN
description:
With James Bond's return in IO Interactive's brand new game, 007 First Light. We get a reboot of the series with a young Bond commencing his career. Built from their in-house Glacier engine, the same that powered the Hitman series. Following an extended game-play reveal last week on PlayStation's State of Play, the mission was too big to pass on. We took a deeper look into the game-play, changes from prior games, physics, resolution and even early performance analysis. The team certainly have ramped up the action and engine another level, which we wanted to cover in out IGN Performance preview.

Chapters
0:00 Introduction
0:40 Glacier engine review and updates for 007
2:07 Graphical quality, effects and feature sets and physics
3:50 Technical leaps and performance demands
8:21 1st thoughts on First Light

#007FirstLight #Gaming #IGN
title: 007 First Light - Performance Preview

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the Splicing Station feature of Voidling Bound in this new trailer for the upcoming sci-fi third-person shooter that reinvents the monster taming genre, as you hatch, evolve, and upgrade powerful space creatures. The Splicing Station gives you total freedom to customize your favorite Voidlings into perfect specimens. The trailer also gives a glimpse at gameplay for the Gwigoon creature. Check it out to see Gwigoon in action! Voidling Bound will be available on PC via Steam in 2026. Learn more about Voidling Bound on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2004680?utm_source=ign&utm_campaign=splicing&utm_medium=press

#IGN #gaming
title: Voidling Bound - Official Splicing Feature Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get your first look at developer Chronospace's revamped War Mechanic, a single-player alternate-history "what if the Manhattan Project had been sabotaged?" action-adventure game where you must survive, pilot your combat car, deal with NPCs that have their own agendas, and build up your base. Wishlist War Mechanic on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2861090/War_Mechanic/

#IGN #gaming
title: War Mechanic - Official Re-reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Digimon Story Time Stranger seems to get the Digimon series, but there’s also the foundation of a really good JRPG here, too. One that might be able to appeal to Digimon oldheads while creating new fans. If licensed games have a holy grail, it’s that. And Time Stranger might be able to find it. Previewed by Will Borger.

#IGN #gaming #digimonstorytimestranger
title: Digimon Story Time Stranger: Our Thoughts After Playing 4 Hours

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the 'Journey Through The Edge of Japan' Flyover for Ghost of Yotei, the next installment in the third-person open-world action-adventure game developed by Sucker Punch Productions. Players can get a glimpse at the scenery in Ghost of Yotei, showcasing the beautiful, sweeping landscapes of Ezo to the sound of the extended version of "The North" composed by Toma Otowa as part of the original soundtrack. Ghost of Yotei is launching on October 2 for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#GhostOfYotei #Gaming #IGN
title: Ghost of Yotei - Official 'Journey Through The Edge of Japan' Flyover
